About Me

Bio

Former elementary school teacher now working to create positive web and mobile experiences for users of all ages. My background in education has provided me with the ability to undertsand the needs of a variety of people and how technology can be endlessly frustrating or a life saver. I have a deep interest in Front-End developemnt and using CSS3, JavaScript and ReactJs to create applications that enhance a users experience.

Web Instructor

Hello World Studios

Work with 3-5 grade students to build their understanding of coding and web developemnt concepts and syntax.

Web Student

UT Austin Full-Stack Coding Bootcamp

Completed projects using front-end and back end platforms such as CSS3, ReactJS, NodeJs and MongoDB. Easily collaborated with classmates to build real world applications.

Elementary School Teacher

Pre-K - 5 grade

Assisted students with managing projects and everyday assignments. Designed and implemented curriculum with a focus on hands-on learning. Communicated effectively with parents regarding students academic and social progress.
